column1: Little Goat Diner////I truly enjoyed Little Goat
column2: not only because the food is delicious but also because the portions are HUGE. I got the sausage and biscuits which were so creamy and delicious
column3: and extremely filling. We also got the pork belly pancake which was full of flavor and the melt in your mouth chocolate crisp pancakes. If you're ever in the West Loop area and choosing from the plethora of restaurants there
